    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the initialize method. It runs first. It contains the auto part ID generation method and variable.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:

      resourceBundle - rb.

    • autoGenPartID

      public static int autoGenPartID()
      Used for auto generation of Part IDs. Returns the autoPartID variable and increments it.
      Returns:
      autoPartID

    • addPartFormSaveClick

      public void addPartFormSaveClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method adds a part into Inventory. Gets the yser entered text and assigns them to a variable. Contains error handling for the Add Part Form. Determines if a part is InHouse or Outsourced and adds them appropriately. Returns to the main screen when a part is added successfully.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Save button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - exception.

    • addPartFormCancelClick

      public void addPartFormCancelClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This returns the user to the Main Screen. A confirmation box appears and if OK is clicked the user is returned to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Cancel button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - exception.

    • inHouseRadioSelected

      public void inHouseRadioSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Used to set the part to InHouse. Changes the part source label to "Machine ID".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Radio Button Selected.

    • outsourcedRadioSelected

      public void outsourcedRadioSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Used to set the part to Outsourced. Changes the part source label to "Company Name".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Radio Button Selected.
